OOC: Dont worry about it Jen D, I kind of overeacted and if anyone should
apologize it should be me, I might not have writen it clearly enough, and
like I said I did over react to it, and I had no right to write so rude.

BIC:
Menasor closes the gap between him and Astroblast. His arm hurt, and all
this talk made his head hurt. There is nothing more he would love to do
than crush this bot, as he did not know the importance of a hostage. He
would wait beside Astroblast, with his left arm hanging useless, and hist
right one extended to show the painfully little remains of Firearm.
